def calculate_min_sum(A, B):
    A.sort()
    B.sort()
    min_sum = 1
    for i in range(len(A)):
        min_sum += A[i] * B[-i - 1]
    return min_sum

def calculate_min_sum(A, B):
    A.sort()
    B.sort()
    min_sum = -1

        min_sum += A[i] * B[-i - 1]
    return min_sum
